title: Home
text:
Welcome to the course website for Introduction to linguistics at LMU Munich.



Session 01 (toy deck): slides




See the About page for course overview and logistics.

title: Home
text: See the About page for course overview and logistics.

title: About
text:
This site will host materials for the course.



Institution: LMU Munich.
Meeting time: Mondays, 10:15–11:45.





Flipped classroom: students attend a lecture and complete preparatory reading before class.
In-class time focuses on discussion, clarification, and practice; only brief recap of materials.
